title: Lily Collins and Kate Mara reveal confidence as they age
title_page: Lily Collins and Kate Mara reveal confidence as they age | Daily Mail Online
text:
They are glamorous Hollywood actresses.
But both Lily Collins, 27, and Kate Mara, 34, reveal they didn't always feel comfortable in their own skin and it wasn't until they were older that they really found their confidence.
Both actresses appeared in Glamour magazine's April 2017 beauty issue in a column called America, The Beautiful, which celebrates game changes who are rewriting the standards of beauty and creating their own definitions for what is the ideal.
Better with age! Lily Collins, 27, and Kate Mara, 34, reveal to Glamour magazine that they didn't always feel comfortable in their own skin and it wasn't until they were older that they really found their confidence
Lily Collins, 27, reveals she had a hard time accepting her eyebrows when she was younger.
'My mom always said the quirky things that make you different are what make you beautiful,' she explained to the magazine. 'But when you're younger, they're normally the things that make you insecure. For me, it was my eyebrows. They were overly thick and luscious.'
She continued: 'So I went to town and plucked them. When you get older, [you realize] the things that define your differences are beautiful.'
The Stuck in Love actress says she learned quite a bit about herself while writing her book Unfiltered: No Regrets, No Shame,Just Me.
Growing into her looks! Lily Collins, 27, reveals she had a hard time accepting her eyebrows when she was younger
'I talk about a lot of the taboo things young girls donâ€™t like to discuss. But the second we do, we realize we're not alone. That includes self-confidence issues, body image issues, and accepting things that are different about yourself,' she explained.
'So it's all about embracing that inner you, almost as a superhero and saying, "We all have flaws." But sometimes those flaws can be turned into our greatest strengths.'
She reveals her favorite beauty secret is an oxygen facial to keep her skin healthy and moisturized.
Staying healthy: The actress reveals her favorite beauty secret is an oxygen facial to keep her skin healthy and moisturized
Meanwhile, 34-year-old Kate Mara says she's never felt more confident than she does now that she is in her thirties.
'As I get older I feel much more confident now than I ever did when I was in my early twenties, she explained. 'I just feel more confident. I think the more you get confident with your inner self, the more confident you feel about your outer in your day.'
Kate says acting is actually what helped her accept herself more than anything and she likes to play characters who have diverse backgrounds.
She explained: 'I think it's beautiful to be vulnerable. And as an actor, it's important for me to play all different kinds [of characters], but I don't want to only play women who have it all together all the time.'
Kate is set to star in Megan Leavey, a film about a U.S. Marine who wins a purple heart while in Iraq with her combat dog Rex. She must fight through beauracratic red tape to adopt her four-legged companion when he retires from duty.
It's set to hit theaters in June.
